role_description: An Ansible role that installs Watchman (a tool that watches for file changes and triggers actions) on almost any platform
role_description_full_overview: [Watchman](https://github.com/facebook/watchman), an open-source Facebook product, can be used to watch files and record when they change. It can also trigger actions when matching files change.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs Watchman (a tool that watches for file changes and triggers actions) on almost any platform.
